Notes: A buzz-saw that moves on a path or remains stationary if no path was assigned. When the player touches the blades, they will take damage. If the saw touches a Bomb-omb or bomb, it will cause an explosion. Several other enemies also take damage when touched by the blades, such as Flipbugs (KoteBug) and Slurples (Karikari).

Obj_arg0.Name: Sawing Type
Obj_arg0.Description: What animations and particles to use when it's active.

Obj_arg1.Name: Pose Type
Obj_arg1.Description: Specifies how to rotate the object.

SW_APPEAR.Description: The object will appear when this switch is activated.

SW_A.Description: Will be activated once it reaches the path's end.

SW_B.Description: Once activated, the object will start moving.

SW_PARAM.Description: The path movement speed is adjusted with ParamScale while this switch is activated.

Rail.Description: The optional path that it can move on.
